atmbranchfinderspring.resourceserver.controllers

Class AccountRequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • atmbranchfinderspring.resourceserver.controllers.AccountRequestController

  • @RestController
public class AccountRequestController
extends java.lang.Object
    AccountRequestController is the API endpoint where TPPs can POST new account-requests, and GET existing ones.
